venue.address_2: From Mass Ave to Melnea Cass Blvd (South End)
venue.name: Beantown Jazz Outdoor Festival

item.description:
Berklee BeanTown Jazz Festival : This signature event sponsored by Berklee College of Music has drawn more than 80,000 attendees in the past, and they have set our sights even higher this year. The festival takes place Saturday, September 24, 2011, from 12:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. on Columbus Avenue between Massachusetts Avenue and Burke Street. Through art, music, and food, this one-of-a-kind annual event celebrates the diversity of the city and the threads that tie us all together.

Check out: www.beantownjazz.org/ 

This is a free event all afternoon with 3 stages set up along Columbus Avenue near Northeastern University campus.  There are many booths selling handcrafts, as well as great jazz and blues music, and yummy ethnic foods.  Come join us for some autumn outdoor fun, and stay as long as you like.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the corner of Columbus Ave, and Mass. Ave promptly at noon. I will have a meetup sign!
item.name: Beantown Jazz Festival
